pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Lip Balm 15+ 4g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula with Vitamin E Lip Balm contains pure Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E to moisturise as well as SPF15 to provide light protection.

Warnings

For external use only. Do not use on children under 6 months old. Always read the label. Follow the directions for use.

Common Uses

The specially formulated emollient base will help keep lips moist and protect them from the drying effects of the sun and wind.

Ingredients

Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Coppernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Fragrance (Parfum), Tocopheryl, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Benzophenone-3, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, CI 40800, Zea Mays Oil, Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Apply regularly to lips when in need of a moisture boost, or when exposed to the sun to help protect against windburn and chapping.
